alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:37PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Phillips County through 530 PM MDT... At 437 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Malta, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malta, Saco, Bowdoin and Sleeping Buffalo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips
